title: Personalized Over Packaged
description: Your travel style is as unique as your fingerprint — so why settle for cookie-cutter itineraries? I take time to get to know you, your goals, your non-negotiables, and your travel vibe.

title: Local, Immersive, Authentic
description: To me, the best moments of travel happen when you go just a little deeper. That’s why I prioritize authentic, local experiences — the tiny wine bar your guidebook skipped, the cooking class in someone’s home, the sunset hike no one’s posted on Instagram.

title: Travel Should Feel Effortless
description: Let’s face it — planning travel can be overwhelming. That’s where I come in. From flights and ferry rides to museum tickets and dinner reservations, I handle every detail so you don’t have to.
